DOC.brief_summary: A double-blind, randomized, single-centre, placebo-controlled, crossover study to investigate the effects of a single oral dose of AZD1386 on intradermal capsaicin evoked pain symptoms and heat sensitivity in healthy volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate the Effects Single Oral Dose of AZD1386 (Capsaicin)
DOC.criteria: Clinical normal physical findings, including BP, pulse rate >45 bpm, ECG and laboratory assessments Body Mass Index (BMI) of ≥18 to ≤30 kg/m2 and weight of ≥50 to ≤100 kg. Nonfertile females History of hypersensitivity, allergy or atopic/skin disease as judged by Investigator. History of somatic or psychiatric disease/condition, which may interfere with the objectives of the study as judged by the Investigator.
